snippet.title: Lance Armstrong & Oprah Winfrey: Cyclist questions punishment
snippet.description:
Sport
Read analysis of the second part of Oprah Winfrey's interview with Lance Armstrong, in which Armstrong questions his punishment for using banned substances

snippet.title: Lance Armstrong & Oprah Winfrey: Cyclist sorry for doping
snippet.description:
Sport
Watch Lance Armstrong end years of denials by admitting he used performance-enhancing drugs during all seven of his Tour de France wins

snippet.title: Lance Armstrong settles $3m bonuses lawsuit
snippet.description:
Cycling / 20 November 2013
Lance Armstrong settles a lawsuit with an insurance company over bonuses he was paid while doping.. Former cyclist Lance Armstrong has settled…

snippet.title: Lance Armstrong: The master storyteller
snippet.description:
Magazine / 17 October 2013

snippet.title: Oprah 'most powerful celebrity' in annual Forbes list
snippet.description:

snippet.title: Nike ends Livestrong Foundation partnership
snippet.description:
US & Canada / 28 May 2013
Sportswear giant Nike is ceasing to make products for the Livestrong Foundation, the cancer charity founded by disgraced cyclist Lance Armstrong.

snippet.title: World Business Report: Lance and the money
snippet.description:
BBC World Service / 18 January 2013
Cyclist Lance Armstrong admits using performance-enhancing drugs - potentially opening himself up to even more legal action. We ask how much money…
